mapper.select: select CHAIRNUM from ktx_order where SSTATION = #{depplacename} and DSTATION= #{arrplacename} and DEPPLANDTIME = #{rtimes} and STIME = #{start_date} and cancel= 0 and chairnum like '_'||#{trnumber}||'호%'
select CHAIRNUM from ktx_order where SSTATION = #{start_add} and DSTATION= #{end_add} and DEPPLANDTIME = #{rtime} and STIME = #{start_date} and cancel= 0 and chairnum like '_'||#{trnumber}||'호%'

SELECT O.sstation, O.rdate, O.DEPPLANDTIME, O.STIME, O.DTIME, O.DSTATION, O.PRICE, O.RESERVNUM, O.TRAINNUM, O.CHAIRNUM, O.CANCEL, O.DEPPLACEID, O.ARRPLACEID, O.CARDNUM, O.TICKETQTY, C.CARDCOMP ,C.RECOGNIZENUM FROM ktx_order O, ktx_cardinfo C WHERE O.cid= C.cid and reservnum=#{reservnum}

SELECT rno, sstation, rdate, depPlandTime, stime, dtime, dstation, price, reservnum, trainnum, chairnum, id, cardnum, cancel FROM (select rownum rno, sstation, to_char(rdate,'yy-mm-dd') rdate, depPlandTime, stime, dtime, dstation, price, reservnum, trainnum, chairnum, id, cardnum, cancel from (select sstation, rdate, depPlandTime, stime, dtime, dstation, price, reservnum, trainnum, chairnum, id, cardnum, cancel FROM KTX_ORDER where cancel=0 order by rdate desc)) where rno between #{startCount} and #{endCount}
